mapper.insert: MERGE INTO cart_tbl c USING dual ON (c.hmal_id = #{hmal_id} and c.pro_num = #{pro_num}) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (cart_code, pro_num, hmal_id) VALUES (seq_cart_code.nextval, #{pro_num}, #{hmal_id})
mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_code, c.pro_num, c.hmal_id, p.pro_name, p.pro_price, p.pro_img, p.pro_uploadpath FROM cart_tbl c INNER JOIN product_tbl p ON c.pro_num = p.pro_num WHERE c.hmal_id = #{hmal_id}
